name: Hand Repair Shop
description:
HAND REPAIR SHOP

Hello employee. Ready to repair some hands?

Controls
  • <arrows> to move the current tool.
  • <O> to swap between tools.
  • <X> while using voltmeter to swap between probes.
  • <X> while using clamp to pick a chip.
  • <p> to pause [and toggle the debug mode].
How to play?

Hand Repair Shop is a puzzle game where you try to find the broken chip in cyberarms' circuits.

To find the broken chip, you have two tools: a voltmeter and a clamp.

The voltmeter have two probes.

  • The red one delivers electricity in the circuit.
  • The black one detects electricity.

Normal chips conduct electricity. Broken chips don't. You can use the voltmeter to check if chips conduct electricity to determine if they are broken or not.

When you have identified the broken chip, use the clamp to pick it.

How to Cheat?

You can toggle the debug mode in the pause menu to see the electricity flowing in the cables. It's not meant to be used normally but use it if you want to understand how the game works or if you just want to cheat, it's ok :)

Notes

This game have been made for the Trijam #193, in 5h of devtime, 2h of asset making and 1h of trying to make music. My goal was to do >3h devtime and >3h art, but I was feeling that the game was a bit hard to understand so I took some time to polish it. If the game is still to hard to understand, don't hesitate to cheat!
